name: 24 Cats
description:
Make the Cats jump and bounce everywhere to get points and new cats!

FEATURES

- Simple and intuitive gameplay

- Collect all 24 Cats by gaining points

- Special Cats and effects

NOTES

- Ads disabled in Web and PC versions.

- Web version won´t save progression. PC and Google Play does.

- PC version quit with Alt + F4

VERSIONS

1.0.5

Bugs fixes: 

-Text showing incorrectly in some phones screens 

-The Spread button activation and text is not synchronized

1.0.4 

Initial release
